Episodes.Title: Go Big or Go Home
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alan Yang
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie encourages Ann to go on a date with Chris so that she can ask for money for Leslie's department, while Ron, Andy, and Tom put together a two-team youth basketball league.

Episodes.Title: Flu Season
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Norm Hiscock
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie gets the flu right before an important fund-raising pitch for the Harvest Festival, Chris tries frantically to avoid catching the bug, and Ron hires Andy to replace April while she is out.

Episodes.Title: Time Capsule
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Katie Dippold
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: A crackpot handcuffs himself to a pipe in Leslie's office and demands that "Twilight" be placed in the Pawnee Time Capsule, and Chris tries to help Andy woo April in spite of Ann's reservations.

Episodes.Title: Ron & Tammy 2
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Emily Kapnek
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: After Ron breaks up with Tom's ex-wife, he decides to get back together with his Tammy, much to everyone's horror. Meanwhile, Leslie and Ben try to get the local police to donate their services to the upcoming Harvest Festival.

Episodes.Title: Media Blitz
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Harris Wittels
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie hits the Pawnee media circuit to promote the Harvest Festival, but Ben freaks out on air when his past is exposed. Meanwhile, April threatens Andy that she'll leave for Indianapolis unless he does her chores.

Episodes.Title: Indianapolis
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Katie Dippold
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Ron go to Indianapolis to receive a commendation from the state. While there, Ron finds out his favorite steak house is closed and Leslie thinks Chris is cheating on Ann. Meanwhile, Tom throws a party for a fragrance de...

Episodes.Title: Harvest Festival
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dan Goor
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: On the day before the Harvest Festival, a local Native American leader places a "curse" on the event because Leslie refuses to give in to his demands.

Episodes.Title: Camping
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Aisha Muharrar
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie sets up a camping trip to brainstorm for new ideas, but she's the one who surprisingly can't come up with anything. Meanwhile, Chris returns to Pawnee as temporary city manager, causing further confusion for Ann.

Episodes.Title: Andy and April's Fancy Party
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Katie Dippold
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Andy and April's party turns into a surprise wedding, but Leslie does not approve. Meanwhile, Ben debates whether to stay in Pawnee, and Donna gives Ann advice at a singles mixer.

Episodes.Title: Soulmates
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alan Yang
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is matched up with Tom on an Internet dating website, while Chris and Ron compete in a hamburger cook-off.

Episodes.Title: Jerry's Painting
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Norm Hiscock
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Chris deals with community uproar over Jerry's new painting, which features a nude Leslie, and Ben tries to help teach Andy and April responsibility after he moves in with them.

Episodes.Title: Eagleton
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Emily Spivey
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is forced to deal with a former beloved colleague-turned bitter enemy when a neighboring town separates a shared park with a fence. Meanwhile, Ron fears the worst when Leslie finds out about his birthday.

Episodes.Title: The Fight
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Amy Poehler
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: While Tom invites everyone to the Snakehole as he debuts a new drink, Leslie encourages Ann to apply for a job with the city. However, at the nightclub, Leslie and Ann get into a fight over their dating habits.

Episodes.Title: Road Trip
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Harris Wittels
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: The romantic tension between Leslie and Ben reaches dangerous levels when they take a work-related road trip to Indianapolis, Tom's "game show" creates tension between Andy and April, and Ron teaches government to a nine year old.

Episodes.Title: The Bubble
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Greg Levine
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's mom makes a pass at Ben, not knowing that he and Leslie are dating. Meanwhile, Chris makes radical changes in the office, and nobody is happy with them.

Episodes.Title: Li'l Sebastian
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dan Goor
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: While the department sets up a memorial service for Li'l Sebastian, Ron finds out about Leslie and Ben, Tom considers taking a job in the private sector, and Chris deals with his own mortality after he discovers that he has tendin...
